ygData.subject: Re: Assassin and Llama
ygData.msgSnippet: Burning Hammer: Hmm, I hope you aren t afraid of me, I can be as loveable as a peach when I m not on a hunt, but most people don t bother, I can be a nuisance

Burning Hammer: Hmm, I hope you aren't afraid of me, I can be as loveable as
a peach when I'm not on a hunt, but most people don't bother, I can be a
nuisance if someone hires me to kill one of their family members. I'm fine
living out a the life of a cold blooded killer, it used to be a drag, but I
got used to it.

Burning Hammer had finally found someone to talk to, and he didn't even
realize that he was telling her things he would never tell anyone, not even
his good side...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 24, 2000 11:01 PM
Subject: Re: Assassin and Llama


> OOC: I just realized she was still in beast mode.
>
> ::Lambda::
>     She smiles.  "Obviously he wasn't very smart if he stole something
from
> you.  My name is Lambda and you can call me ... well you can decide that
> yourself within a day."  She laughs politely at his joke.  She transforms
> into robot mode and steps in front of him just off to the side walking
> backwards.  She stays carefully out of the way.  "I bet I don't look like
> your foolish friend the thief either."
>
>
>
>
